title: Introduction to the Theory of Error-Correcting Codes
summary: Introduction to the Theory of Error-Correcting Codes is a textbook on error-correcting codes, by Vera Pless. It was published in 1982 by John Wiley & Sons,[1][2][3][4] with a second edition in 1989[5][6][7][8] and a third in 1998.[9][10] The Basic Library List Committee of the Mathematical Association of America has rated the book as essential for inclusion in undergraduate mathematics libraries.[11]
